title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser 

(Minister of State at the Department of Finance) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister state department finance) order 2020

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser
heading: 2. Aidan O’Connor, particulars of whose address have been deposited at
text_raw:
2. Aidan O’Connor, particulars of whose address have been deposited at 
the offices of the Department of Finance, is appointed to be a Special Adviser 
to Seán Fleming, Minister of State at the Department of Finance, with effect 
from 2 November 2020. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

17 November, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 20th November, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [531] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
